mapper.select: select seq, social_id, member_name, profile_image, birthday, birth_year, (select ifnull(format(sum(point_amount), 0), 0) from point_history where user_seq = #{seq} and point_type = 0) as point, (select count(seq) from coupon_history where user_seq = #{seq}) as coupon, gender, phone from member where seq = #{seq}
